summary: A childless couple passes off an anthropomorphous tree stump as their baby, but things get out of hand when the thing comes to life and demands to be fed.
cast: Veronika Zilková|Jan Hartl|Jaroslava Kretschmerová|Pavel Nový|Kristina Adamcová|Dagmar Stríbrná|Zdenek Kozák|Gustav Vondracek|Arnost Goldflam|Jitka Smutná|Jirí Lábus|Radek Holub|Jan Jirán|Zdenek Palusga|Frantisek Polata|Vaclav Jezek|Joseph Cahill|Tomás Hanák|Vincent Navrátil
keywords: folk horror|absurdism|based on folktale|killer child|monster baby
title: El pequeño Otik
